name: irq::top_half::Inner::new

alloc::vec::Vec::<T>::new.doc:
Constructs a new, empty `Vec<T>`.

 The vector will not allocate until elements are pushed onto it.

 # Examples

 ```
 # #![allow(unused_mut)]
 let mut vec: Vec<i32> = Vec::new();
 ```

sync::rwlock::RwLock::<T, G>::new.doc: Creates a new spin-based read-write lock with an initial value.
